Tweet anything from Firefox context menu

== Compatibility ==

 * Firefox 4.0 - 6.0a2

== Features ==

=== Context menus ===

 * Main context menu
  * on web page
  * on a link
  * on a frame/iframe
  * on an image

 * Tab context menu

 * Bookmark context menu

=== Echofon integration ===

You can choose between default Twitter [https://twitter.com/intent/tweet tweet page] or use [http://www.echofon.com/ Echofon] to tweet.
